EmailTemplate.name: SR HTML Closure to citizen
EmailTemplate.subject: Your 311 Request has been closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear resident,
Your request for {!Case.Subject} at {!Case.Address__c} was completed on {!Case.ClosedDate} and has been closed by {!Case.Servicing_Agency_Expanded__c}. Please visit 311.dc.gov to review any notes on your request or to find answers to frequently asked questions. You may also call 311 and reference service request number {!Case.CaseNumber}. An agent will be happy to answer your questions, concerns or connect you with the correct department.
